wikisource-export-portlet: Heading for a portlet/section of the sidebar. Usually exactly the same as {{msg-mw|coll-print_export}} and similar to {{msg-mw|toolbox}}.
wikisource-download-epub: Link text to download an EPUB format file.
wikisource-download-epub-tooltip: Tooltip text for the link to download an EPUB file.
wikisource-download-mobi: Link text to download a MOBI format file.
wikisource-download-mobi-tooltip: Tooltip text for the link to download a MOBI file.
wikisource-download-pdf: Link text to download a PDF format file.
wikisource-download-pdf-tooltip: Tooltip text for the link to download a PDF file.
wikisource-download-choose: Link text to go to an external page to download other formats.
wikisource-download-choose-tooltip: Tooltip text for the 'other formats' link.
